website_summaries.verdict: High-quality engine enamel paint that resists high temperatures and is easy to apply, all at a great price.
pros: Trusted brand name that's available in multiple colors at a desirable price point
Specially engineered to resist oil, grease, rust, and salt
Withstands temps up to 500 degrees Fahrenheit
Easy to apply, as spray can contains a nozzle that will work at any angle
cons: Will require seven days to completely cure

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this for a craft - making trivets out of ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a craft - making trivets out of tiles. This product provided a clear coating to preserve the painted design on the tile. With a trivet, it is of course necessary for the finish to withstand heat from a hot pot or pan. Indeed it does (I applied 3 coats), and the decorative top of the trivet remained unmarred.
customer_reviews.author: Mamalee

customer_reviews.title: Good Engine Paint
customer_reviews.text: I bought to paint my 5.3 LS engine. I used the Rustoleum 500 degree engine primer first and then painted this over it. Nice Chevy orange on my LS engine looks great in my 1968 C10 pickup. I recommend this product for the good quality paint results i achieved.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Will work for Ariens snowblower touch ups.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this paint for some touchups on my Ariens snowblower. I read this was similar and it's much less expensive than the Ariens touch up paint. The match is extremely close (show car close? no, snowblower? absolutely) I sprayed a piece of scrap metal before spraying anything on the snowblower. I purchased 2 cans of this for 1/3rd the price of one can of Ariens paint shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Prep, prep, prep
customer_reviews.text: Paint is amazing for wheels. Brake dust doesn't harm finish, prep is key. Light misting coats is also key.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Morales

customer_reviews.title: Final product is okay but spraying is terrible
customer_reviews.text: I've recently rebuilt a motor and decided to paint it. I used a can of Dupli-Color engine primer as a base and then sprayed this over the top of it. The Rost-Oleum engine paint has a really crappy nozzle, it clogs very easily and either sprays way too much or very little, so it's a very inconstant application. If you warm the can up to about 75F before hand it does go on a little better but it's still hit or miss on an even spray. I much prefer the Dupli-Color style nozzle.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Neuforth

customer_reviews.title: RustO Aluminum
customer_reviews.text: I hope this holds up but it looks amazing. Painted a 22r engine block to match a theme build. The outcome was not the exact tone a wanted but it turned out beter then I expected. The picture does not do justice. This looks just like a candy blue. Lots of prep to remove ALL oil grease and varnishes. 2 coats RustO High heat Engine primer 3 coats RustO High heat Aluminum 3 coats Dupli-C MetalCast Blue 3 coats RustO High heat clear
customer_reviews.author: DIY or Die

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE THIS - IT CRACKED MY BASE COAT
customer_reviews.text: I am so mad right now. Spent the whole day wire wheeling my engine parts and priming, painting, waiting another 24 hours in very warm weather. I came back the next day to put clear coat on to the valve cover and manifolds. I started with the valve cover and as soon as I laid down a coat, it started eating my base layer and cracking lifting. Now I will need to buy another base coat, take that paint off in that section and recoat. All products from the same line of engine enamel and not mixed. properly followed instructions. So upset right now.
customer_reviews.author: Andy A.

customer_reviews.title: Heat proven to over 500 degrees
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to conceal several large chips to my Weber kettle BBQ top after it landed on my patio when I dropped it . The color did not quite match but was close enough to not stand out too much , the paint went on well and I did not need a second coat . The BBQ has been over 500 degrees and no problem to the paint . Next summer I think I will spray the whole top and it will look great again . Good product that stands up to so much heat and looks great .
customer_reviews.author: Angus

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Paint
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand and paint. I use it on all my vehicles when painting my exhaust pipes. and other areas. It really was tested when I lived in Mexico on the beach and it held up very well under the harsh warm salt air conditions. It saved my vehicle from rusting out! And, on my BBQ, works well too.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: HARD AS NAILS!
customer_reviews.text: If you want long-lasting, hardwearing. slow run, super high gloss, chip-resistant paint use this for all jobs! not just high heat! if you want less than that use some regular paint they cost about the same...get it!!! Thumbs up...;]
customer_reviews.author: Mariann Enright

customer_reviews.title: OK but sprays out way too fast
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to use as so much sprays out so rapidly there's streaks everywhere if your not extremely careful. or even if you are. Decent nozzle wold likely fix this.
customer_reviews.author: Hepsiebaw Mchorselstrapp

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Take some time to dry up, but worked on my car's exhaust pipes, and rusted parts under the car very well. Even if it lasted for one winter, I can top-up before next winter so that my car remains protected from developing rust while the road has too much salt, snow, and water.
customer_reviews.author: Upahar J

customer_reviews.title: Great paint
customer_reviews.text: Love the finish of this paint. I have used it in the past with great results and deceided to try it on a set of 24 year old Jeep rims. The results were outstanding. Make sure to prep your surface well and the paint will do the rest. Works best if you primer first.
customer_reviews.author: Dozer

customer_reviews.title: Tough.
customer_reviews.text: Made a nice hard clear after one coat. I decided to go for three coats in total for a motorcycle gas tank and it looks amazing. Very tough and little gas drops don’t seem to effect it. Just be gentle on the spray. My first coat was heavy handed and I made a little run.
customer_reviews.author: Echo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I paint the underside, frame and wheel wells of my trucks with this low gloss black paint. It seems to hold up well and sure makes things look nice. I would recommend it to anyone. Keep an eye on them, especially if you're going to buy a lot of them like me, the price goes way up and way down sporadically.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Good product as always
customer_reviews.text: I've used Rustoleum quite a bit, and have always had good results. This is no exception. The quality of their products are very consistent. It's a good mid-range option for painting on a budget. Like with anything, take your time and do correct prep and post work, and the results will be acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Achilles

customer_reviews.title: Chemicals for my Chevy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered paint for the heads and gasket remover to prepare them. I respected it to take a while to come in. I now get to work over X-Mas. It only took a couple of days. They was also just as described. A great decision to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jarhead

customer_reviews.title: Great match for Ariens snowblower paint
customer_reviews.text: I needed some paint for old Ariens snowblower touchup and for painting a light bar I made for my newer Ariens snowblower. Great match!
customer_reviews.author: Ernest A Morin

customer_reviews.title: Appropriate color for Honda dirt bikes
customer_reviews.text: The cast aluminum color is a good match for vintage Honda dirt bike engine side covers and cylinder head covers. I used this in my restoration of a 1985 XL100S, and I'm very pleased with the results. It might not be a 100% match for what Honda used in the factory, but I'm a perfectionist and this is close enough for me. I have had good results with Rust-Oleum engine paints in the past, and have found them to be durable and perform as-advertised.
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: Grab this paint the look and feel is amazing
customer_reviews.text: This red is amazing and very durable for plastics and exhaust which I used for on a couple different builds totally worth the cost just in the shine out of the can
customer_reviews.author: Travis thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great for over oven hood
customer_reviews.text: Has a nice coverage and shine, used a gray primer first on the hood, 2 thin coats did the job, pleased with the result looks like it was painted at the factory.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Maria Maxim

customer_reviews.title: Great covering paint
customer_reviews.text: I use this to paint an engine block and covered the area extremely well, not thin like others, I haven’t used the engine to see how heat resistant it is, but I’m sure it will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: ray

customer_reviews.title: Good, a bit runny so go slow when spraying.
customer_reviews.text: Used to paint headlight housings, I think I may of sprayed too much at one time since it got a bit runny but I can't notice unless I'm really close.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Sprayer clogged 40 seconds into project. Epic fail
customer_reviews.text: The entire spray portion clogged about 40 seconds into my project. I tried rinsing out the nozzle and the But could not get it to spray anymore. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: linda bowlen

customer_reviews.title: Affordable/convenient
customer_reviews.text: Used on an oil pan. Works great. Let dry a day before sanding. Also, Chicago won't let you buy spray paint in the city but Amazon will deliver this to your door so you don't have to go to the suburbs
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Ednie

customer_reviews.title: Good paint.
customer_reviews.text: Painted my motorcycle engine with this and it came out great. Put about 500 miles on it since and it still looks like I put it on yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: stildreamn

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I hate looking at rust the beginning of the summer season so a few coats of this not only help protect but also makes things look so much nicer!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Cheapest i can find, decent delivery, sprays on well. Just have to see how it holds up
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Wanted the color on a small part of my chevy engine small block the gray is a nice touch. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy Dave

customer_reviews.title: Good name brand you can trust!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and name brand. I’ve used this brand on many car project and always been happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible paint and don’t spray clear coat over it
customer_reviews.text: Sprayed clear coat on the engine paint and it bubbled up, cheap paint and wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.author: Greg G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: An exact FACTORY CORRECT match for my 1966 ford galaxie 390fe block..........Incredible gloss finish that last in 500* heat
customer_reviews.author: Kyla B. Hagen

customer_reviews.title: Love these !!
customer_reviews.text: Have bought a dozen of these for misc. stuff. Sprayed anything from plastic, fabric and metal and it always looks good and holds up!!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Painted a mercruiser 350. Match the factory gloss black perfectly. Sprays nicely and has a very high gloss.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie 2 times 2 times

customer_reviews.title: Paint Saved Money!!
customer_reviews.text: I used the paint for a frame around my built- in microwave--had to be a heat-resistant paint. So far it is holding up quite well! I have not seen evidence otherwise. It has saved me having to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great paint
customer_reviews.text: Paint had great color. Just what I needed to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Graham

customer_reviews.title: Favorite black paint for steel wheels
customer_reviews.text: I use it to paint steelies and give em a fresh new take on life. Lol. Ive bought a bunch of these for any time I have the chance to refurbish some old steel wheels.
customer_reviews.author: sup

customer_reviews.title: Timely delivery
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly, worked well and time will tell on the heat resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Gose

customer_reviews.title: Really nice paint.
customer_reviews.text: Cover really well. Quality can that sprays out 100% of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Flood

customer_reviews.title: Forget the Color on the Lid
customer_reviews.text: Beware the lid shows it has orange in it NOT its red and Im stuck with this
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Fans

customer_reviews.title: Good quality paint.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work really well but let it get thoroughly cured before splashing gas on it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T. Halbirt

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: Used on a pressure washer muffler and it burned off on the top in about 6 hours of continued use
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Price

customer_reviews.title: Great Paint for Grill Refurbishing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to refurbish my GMG Smoker. It worked great and looks BA!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Look like a pro, even if you’re not
customer_reviews.text: Could be more durable, but found a lighter thinner coat doesn’t chip as easily.
customer_reviews.author: Tindall Knives

customer_reviews.title: Great paint for a Traeger smoker/grill.
customer_reviews.text: Painted my hand-me-down and very old Traeger and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: peebs_9

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: It's been a year now and no blistering or signs of wear on Valve Covers!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charles J.

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to paint my engine, so far so good. I recommend the primer as well.
customer_reviews.author: Windy Bettis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks excellent on my aluminum block and adhesion looks great so far.
customer_reviews.author: hw_engineerTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: ... little off from the batting machine color but looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Color is a little off from the batting machine color but looks good. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Primed, using Rust-Oleum primer, top coat went on nice and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Moe2261

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Rustoleum is a great product. A little pricey, but I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Fred k

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality spray cans!
customer_reviews.text: Paint is decent, but several of the 20 cans purchased would only spray a portion of the paint from can; lost its aerosol!
customer_reviews.author: David Rank

customer_reviews.title: it worked great. However
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed the engine block of my 79 XS 650. Where it baked on due to engine heat, it worked great. However, I got gas on one of the cooler areas and it peeled. As can be expected.
customer_reviews.author: michael Cook

customer_reviews.title: The color should be exact what's on the can but it wasn't
customer_reviews.text: The only thing the color of the top that's the color I was looking for but when I got the can the blue wasn't as bright as that color I wasn't all that happy the color should be exactly what's on the can
customer_reviews.author: Earl

customer_reviews.title: Paint is baby blue much lighter than pictured! Beside that it is great paint.
customer_reviews.text: Color is baby blue very light. I have 7 coats on there and this is as dark as it got. Not what i wanted but will do
customer_reviews.author: josh b.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Sprayed on evenly and leaves a shine. You can get away with just two coats.
customer_reviews.author: A C

customer_reviews.title: I always use rust-Oleum paints for my car frames and ...
customer_reviews.text: I always use rust-Oleum paints for my car frames and small products. The dry is a little slow but not problem.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I actually had to paint something plastic and it did it's job had to do like 2 passes though but that was no big deal it worked as intended so I have no complaints but wear gloves when using this products it's very hard to take off your skin.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Best!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t love it more. Makes my baby looks new again!
customer_reviews.author: Wenbo

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, looks fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Used it for painting my motorcycle engine, worked amazing. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: IH24

customer_reviews.title: not ad goos as they say
customer_reviews.text: allowed to drop, baked on and still comes off easily with any sort of petrol based chemical. disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wichter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on my stock exhaust tips. They were chrome now gloss black. Had no issue bonding to the surface. I did not use sand paper just cleaned and went for it. Turned out great. Been on for about a month or so now with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Michael

customer_reviews.title: Like to keep everything original
customer_reviews.text: Always use this when painting engine parts as it holds up well. Black I used on a air-cleaner. Looks great
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Good value for quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Used this to repaint a vintage engine. Sprayed on nicely and color was a perfect match. Can’t comment on heat resistance since it’s not running yet but I’ve used this brand before with good results.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S

customer_reviews.title: solid
customer_reviews.text: Excellent as are most of their spray paints. Used to spray both a plastic car badge and a metal one and both look great. I did prime first. Good red, darker than most but still good.
customer_reviews.author: MylesD

customer_reviews.title: Sprayed on sanded, acid washed bare aluminum, left dry one days, started peeling next day after rain
customer_reviews.text: Will not stick , even on properly prepped surfaces, having to strip entire exhaust and repaint with another product. Terrible plus 2 days work wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not low gloss
customer_reviews.text: It sprays on ok but it's more like flat black than "low gloss".
customer_reviews.author: D. Plass

customer_reviews.title: NOT A MATCH!!!
customer_reviews.text: Did NOT match my paint on my 1999 Ford Ranger! Can’t return it, total waste of $!!!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: great color
customer_reviews.text: worked well to paint our partially buried outdoor bowling balls to look like lady bugs
customer_reviews.author: public name

customer_reviews.title: horrible color match
customer_reviews.text: Too dark, too expensive. Better off buying a pint of premix on ebay. more expensive, but a much better match
customer_reviews.author: K. meyer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dose not run as easy as most orange paints do.
customer_reviews.author: Jay N.

customer_reviews.title: Great spray 6
customer_reviews.text: Always used this brand of spray paint and I was never disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Lansky1971

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice color, we will see how durable can be. I just painted the calipers of my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro N.

customer_reviews.title: WTF? Broken spray nozzle?
customer_reviews.text: I've been had. Received a non returnable broken nozzle can of paint. That explains the free shipping! Thanks alot!
customer_reviews.author: Rextar Promodel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great paint. Sprays nice, price is cheap, and its Rustoleum. A+
customer_reviews.author: Arthur K

customer_reviews.title: No problems .
customer_reviews.text: Blue paint . What more can I say . No problem
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: used to coat used parts from salvage yard before putting on car we'll see how it holds up
customer_reviews.author: wazup132

customer_reviews.title: Worked well and lower oder than other clear spray
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a craft project as a clear coat and it worked well. I applied it outside but after drying when I brought items back inside they had a much less noticeable odor than other clear glaze spray paints I'd used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: GKB_13

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find
customer_reviews.text: This paint is very hard to find in most stores.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A Messmer

customer_reviews.title: Paint worked great.
customer_reviews.text: Paint worked great. I actually used it to paint the lower leg on a 40hp outboard. One boating season later, the paint still looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Painted the drums on the car and has held up very well
customer_reviews.author: Dzu Duong

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Stuff works great and its inexpensive. Just painted a back bike that I trail ride with. It comes close to Kawasaki Lime Green.
customer_reviews.author: Carroll Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Fair Match for Kubota Orange
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, it is a reasonable match for the small Kubota Tractors, Orange. Definitely cheaper than buying from a dealer.
customer_reviews.author: BitTwiddler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product but follow the instructions carefully
customer_reviews.text: Be careful to follow the instructions closely. Shake the can VERY WELL for several minutes. Prep the surface carefully. The first coat on my motorcycle mufflers came out flat gray. After Wiping them down with body prep and shaking the heck out of the can the next day for a second coat, the satin black color came through. I wiped them with body prep again and went through the curing process outlined on the can and they came out spectacular. Durable too. It's worth the time to do it right.
customer_reviews.author: G. E. Glaum

customer_reviews.title: Best in the world
customer_reviews.text: I used this paint to paint my Tool Box it looks Good. It was a black color and did not look good so i did it Red
customer_reviews.author: DJ-Dizzy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Price & Quality, Fast & Safe Arrival, Very Happy
customer_reviews.author: Storm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does the job without causing any combustibility problems for the engine on my riding mower.
customer_reviews.author: Stan L.

customer_reviews.title: Worked alright
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my indoor cooking stove (the top of the stove was white so I wanted to paint it black to match everything else in the kitchen). Within 3 months, it started chipping. I don't really do a lot of heavy cooking, I figured outdoor use on a bbq grill would be more heavy-duty due to it being outside (rain, sunshine, etc).
customer_reviews.author: AOK

customer_reviews.title: Wow great finish
customer_reviews.text: makes a oem finish on my restorations. looks factory and clean application glossy like glass no pealing issues when applied to preped urface.
customer_reviews.author: rsalamun6147

customer_reviews.title: Great product, chinese delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Can ran out of air with 75% of the paint still in the can. Spray pattern is unacceptable. Paint cans were a million times better 10 years ago. Poor spray patterns with tips that clog after one use and throwing out half full cans is becoming a normal thing. The paint in the can protects incredible well. Should have bought the brush on type. Great product, chinese delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use this to paint my Caliper Breaks does not peel when its hot
customer_reviews.author: EDGAR CATALA

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get the right temp.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be high enough heat for my bike's engine, no so much. I should have gotten the 1500 degree paint! Good paint though, would work well on a 4 stroke, or near warm spots (say the frame NEAR, not on, the exhaust pipe.)
customer_reviews.author: DJL

customer_reviews.title: the best paint ever
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a lot of paints,but this is the best of all buzz can paints I have ever used. A+++++++ all the way
customer_reviews.author: don

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on my mini wsm build
customer_reviews.text: I bought this paint as part of a mini wsm smoker build. It was used as a base coat on the smoker which can see temps in the 350-400 range. The paint has been on the smoker since 10/1/2013 and I have not experienced any issues. The paint went on without any problems, dried quickly and looks good. I can't comment on how it would do on an engine, but it works great on bbq grills/smokers.
customer_reviews.author: Ky

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PAINT.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PAINT, IT WAS A VERY EASY APPLICATION, IT ALSO HAS A GREAT FINISH, I WOULD RECOMMEND IT TO EVERYONE, IT IS AN AMAZING PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: CHESTER G. JONES

customer_reviews.title: Spray Paint
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful red and I used it on my engine to accent the spark wires, but this paint is definitely not up to 500 degrees... my engine without the heat shields gets up around 200 and the paint starts to burn off. so if your engine stays cool definitely worth it but if it gets any were near hot not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: SBC 355 Engine Paint
customer_reviews.text: This paint really applied great. Very smooth and a great finish. Did 3 coats of primer and 4 coats of paint. Very happy with the outcome. Time will tell if it's durable and lasts but for now, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Justin M.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Used it paint my wheels black and with 2 coats on all 4 wheels still had half can left. Used rest to paint rear and front bumper. No chipping even after taking it offroad through bushes. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Deven

customer_reviews.title: Like the Color
customer_reviews.text: Used it to refinish a few Dietz lanterns and they look sharp and can take the flame without smoke or wrinkling. I really like the finish qualities of the paint.
customer_reviews.author: NormanZ

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Used it in my newest overhaul project engine and it looks great. Very shiny finish and bright color. I wish it was sold locally.
customer_reviews.author: Amarilys Rodriguez

product_meta.title: Rust-Oleum 248945 Automotive Rust Preventive Engine Enamel Spray Paint, 12 Oz Aerosol Can, Ford Blue
product_meta.description:
Size Name:12 oz| Color:Ford BlueRust-Oleum 248945 Automotive Rust Preventive Engine Enamel Spray Paint, 12 Oz Aerosol Can, Ford Blue

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Rust-Oleum Engine Enamel creates a smooth finish and is formulated for use on automotive engines and other automotive surfaces which reach intermittent temperatures up to 500°F (260°C).
feature_bullets: Resists Oil, gas, grease, rust, salt, humidity and solvents

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars767 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
